thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au | 2 of 28
thread.title: Glen

author: Glen
title: Glen
text: I have been with Nelson Alexander just over a year now. The service has been excellent . Brittany in particular has taken all the worry and hassle out of maintaining my rental properties. I have great tenants thanks to Brittany's careful vetting. I can go away and everything is taken care of to my instructions. My properties are in good hands and I can relax
